headline: Ross Stores, Inc. (ROST): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Ross Stores, Inc. on The Wealth Dynasty Report’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ROST. Ross Stores, Inc.’s share was trading at $190.74 as of February 6th. ROST’s trailing and forward P/E were 29.80 and 26.81 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Ross Stores, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates off-price retail apparel and home fashion stores under the Ross Dress for Less and dd’s DISCOUNTS brands […]
